```{r global, include = FALSE}
library(conflicted)
packages <- c(
  "shinyMatrix", "ComplexHeatmap", "circlize"
)
lapply(packages, FUN = library, character.only = TRUE)

top_anno <- HeatmapAnnotation(
  sample = anno_block(
    gp = gpar(fill = "lightgray", col = "lightgray"),
    labels = c("Sample 1", "Sample 2", "Sample 3", "Sample 4"),
    labels_gp = gpar(col = "black", fontsize = 15),
    height = unit(10, "mm")
  )
)
```

```{r}
vec <- c(
  rep(50, times = 10), rep(c(95, 5), times = 5),
  rep(5, times = 10), rep(95, times = 10)
)
set.seed(1)
noise <- round(runif(20, min = -4, max = 4))

default_mat <- matrix(
  vec + noise,
  nrow =  10,
  ncol = 4,
  dimnames = list(
    paste("Gene", toupper(letters[1:10]), " "),
    c("Sample 1", "Sample 2", "Sample 3", "Sample 4")
  )
)

shinyApp(
  ui = fluidPage(
    sidebarPanel(
      width = 4,
      tags$h3(
        HTML("тож Click Cells to Edit Matrix тоз"), style = "text-align:center"
      ),
      matrixInput(
        "mat",
        label = "Hypothetical Raw Gene Count X Sample Matrix",
        value = default_mat
      )
    ),
    mainPanel(
      width = 4,
      plotOutput("gene_heatmap", height = "450px")
    ),
    mainPanel(
      width = 4,
      plotOutput("gse_heatmap", height = "450px")
    )
  ),
  server = function(input, output, session) {

    output$gene_heatmap <- renderPlot({
      heatmap_mat <- apply(input$mat, MARGIN = 2, FUN = as.numeric)
      rownames(heatmap_mat) <- rownames(input$mat)

      col_range <- c(
        min(heatmap_mat),
        (min(heatmap_mat) + max(heatmap_mat)) / 2,
        max(heatmap_mat)
      )

      draw(
        Heatmap(
          heatmap_mat,
          name = "Gene Expression\n",
          col = colorRamp2(col_range, colors = c("blue", "white", "red")),
          cluster_rows = FALSE,
          cluster_columns = FALSE,
          show_column_names = FALSE,
          top_annotation = top_anno,
          column_split = seq(4),
          column_title = "Hypothetical Raw Gene Count by Sample Matrix",
          rect_gp = gpar(col = "black", lwd = 0.5),
          column_gap = unit(1, units = "mm"),
          row_names_gp = gpar(fontsize = 15),
          column_title_gp = gpar(fontsize = 18),
          row_names_side = "left",
          heatmap_legend_param = list(
            labels_gp = gpar(fontsize = 15), title_gp = gpar(fontsize = 15),
            legend_height = unit(4, units = "cm"), border = "lightgrey",
            grid_width = unit(0.75, "cm")
          )
        )
      )
    })

    output$gse_heatmap <- renderPlot({
      heatmap_mat <- apply(input$mat, MARGIN = 2, FUN = as.numeric)
      heatmap_mat <- matrix(
        c(
          sum(heatmap_mat[ , 1]) * 2 -
            sum(abs(heatmap_mat[ , 1] - mean(heatmap_mat[ , 1]))),
          sum(heatmap_mat[ , 2]) * 2 -
            sum(abs(heatmap_mat[ , 2] - mean(heatmap_mat[ , 2]))),
          sum(heatmap_mat[ , 3]) * 2 -
            sum(abs(heatmap_mat[ , 3] - mean(heatmap_mat[ , 3]))),
          sum(heatmap_mat[ , 4]) * 2 -
            sum(abs(heatmap_mat[ , 4] - mean(heatmap_mat[ , 4])))
        ),
        nrow =  1,
        ncol = 4,
        dimnames = list(
          "Gene Set X  \n(Genes A to J)  ",
          c("Sample 1", "Sample 2", "Sample 3", "Sample 4")
        )
      )

      col_range <- c(
        min(heatmap_mat),
        (min(heatmap_mat) + max(heatmap_mat)) / 2,
        max(heatmap_mat)
      )

      draw(
        Heatmap(
          heatmap_mat,
          name = "Gene Set Score\n",
          col = colorRamp2(col_range, colors = c("blue", "white", "red")),
          cluster_rows = FALSE,
          cluster_columns = FALSE,
          show_column_names = FALSE,
          top_annotation = top_anno,
          column_split = seq(4),
          column_title = "Resulting Gene Set Enrichment by Sample Matrix",
          rect_gp = gpar(col = "black", lwd = 0.5),
          column_gap = unit(1, units = "mm"),
          row_names_gp = gpar(fontsize = 16),
          column_title_gp = gpar(fontsize = 18),
          row_names_side = "left",
          heatmap_legend_param = list(
            labels_gp = gpar(fontsize = 15), title_gp = gpar(fontsize = 15),
            legend_height = unit(4, units = "cm"), border = "lightgrey",
            grid_width = unit(0.75, "cm")
          )
        )
      )
    })

  }
)
```
